title: Geth using 100% CPU even on starting with 1 miner thread

body: yeah please ignore the js script, even if we dont preload the script the cpu core usage spikes to 100%, can you help me resolve it ?

Actually I thought passing the fast syncmode flag was causing the all cpu cores usage, I removed passing the js script file and now my command is like - nohup geth --mine --minerthreads=1  --rpc --rpcport "8545" --rpccorsdomain "*"  --rpc --rpcaddr "10.0.18.4" --datadir ./datadir --port "30306" --rpcapi "db,eth,net,web3,personal,miner,admin"  --ws --wsaddr "10.0.18.4" --wsorigins "*" --networkid 39923  &  and still I'm facing high cpu usage
@rjl493456442  I have updated the actual js script which I'm passing when launching the geth. Even without it I'm having the high cpu usage @karalabe @fjl

This is the log while the cpu cores are 100% used, clearly my private net is getting connection requests from public nodes that are hardcoded in the client code maybe -

Can you guys help me how can I avoid alien nodes making any connections to my private network
#15358 this is related to my issue
closing because the hack shared in issue 15358 worked
